basics.name: Mauro Alejandro Castillo Calatayud
basics.label: Systems Engineer
basics.summary: Systems Engineering graduate with experience in web and mobile application development, database management, and network configuration. Teamwork-oriented, self-taught, and dedicated.

work.name: Educar Para La Vida Foundation
work.summary: Creation of a desktop educational application for learning about the Sustainable Development Goals. Management of the official YouTube channel.

work.name: Machine Learning
work.summary: Development of functionalities for the remittance and personnel control system of PRODEM bank.

work.name: Novex
work.summary: Development of a WhatsApp chatbot for automatic responses through advertising link recognition.

work.name: Central Bank of Bolivia
work.summary: Development of a website for visualizing documents from the Internal Audit repository.

education.area: Advanced Computing, Technical English and Public Speaking
Web Development with Laravel, Angular, Node and Symfony
courses: Full Stack Web Master: Angular, Node, Laravel, Symfony +

projects.name: Educational Game on the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
projects.description: Development of a desktop application to facilitate learning about the Sustainable Development Goals, including the management of the official YouTube channel of the Educar Para La Vida Foundation.
highlights: Implementation of a user-friendly and educational interface.
Creation of multimedia content to complement learning.

projects.name: Remittance and Personnel Control System
projects.description: Development of key functionalities for the remittance control and personnel management system of PRODEM bank.

projects.name: WhatsApp Chatbot with Advertising Link Recognition
projects.description: Development of a WhatsApp chatbot to automate responses and perform analysis of advertising links shared by users.
highlights: Recognition and analysis of patterns in advertising links.

projects.name: Website for Internal Audit Repository
projects.description: Development of a website for the visualization and management of documents from the Internal Audit repository of the Central Bank of Bolivia.
highlights: Design and implementation of an advanced search system.
Optimization of access to confidential documents.
